name: auth_users_exposed
title: Exposed Auth Users
description: Detects if auth.users is exposed to anon or authenticated roles via a view or materialized view in schemas exposed to PostgREST, potentially compromising user data security.
detail: View/Materialized View "popular_templates" in the public schema may expose \`auth.users\` data to anon or authenticated roles.

name: auth_users_exposed
title: Exposed Auth Users
description: Detects if auth.users is exposed to anon or authenticated roles via a view or materialized view in schemas exposed to PostgREST, potentially compromising user data security.
detail: View/Materialized View "featured_templates" in the public schema may expose \`auth.users\` data to anon or authenticated roles.

name: security_definer_view
title: Security Definer View
description: Detects views defined with the SECURITY DEFINER property. These views enforce Postgres permissions and row level security policies (RLS) of the view creator, rather than that of the querying user
detail: View \`public.product_ratings\` is defined with the SECURITY DEFINER property

title: Security Definer View
description: Detects views defined with the SECURITY DEFINER property. These views enforce Postgres permissions and row level security policies (RLS) of the view creator, rather than that of the querying user

name: rls_references_user_metadata
title: RLS references user metadata
description: Detects when Supabase Auth user_metadata is referenced insecurely in a row level security (RLS) policy.
detail: Table \`public.stripe_customers\` has a row level security policy \`Admins can view all stripe_customers\` that references Supabase Auth \`user_metadata\`. \`user_metadata\` is editable by end users and should never be used in a security context.

name: rls_references_user_metadata
title: RLS references user metadata
description: Detects when Supabase Auth user_metadata is referenced insecurely in a row level security (RLS) policy.
detail: Table \`public.subscriptions\` has a row level security policy \`Admins can view all subscriptions\` that references Supabase Auth \`user_metadata\`. \`user_metadata\` is editable by end users and should never be used in a security context.

detail: Table \`public.page_content_history\` has a row level security policy \`Only admins can read page content history\` that references Supabase Auth \`user_metadata\`. \`user_metadata\` is editable by end users and should never be used in a security context.
cache_key: rls_references_user_metadata_public_page_content_history_Only admins can read page content history

name: sensitive_columns_exposed
title: Sensitive Columns Exposed
description: Detects tables exposed via API that contain columns with potentially sensitive data (PII, credentials, financial info) without RLS protection.
detail: Table `public.api_key` is exposed via API without RLS and contains potentially sensitive column(s): token. This may lead to data exposure.
